thread.title: Fargo Sets Season 3 Premiere Date for April
thread.title_full: Fargo Sets Season 3 Premiere Date for April

title: Fargo Sets Season 3 Premiere Date for April

persons.name: jude law pepsi ad beat beyoncé

organizations.name: real housewives of beverly hills recap
better than real life bill maher

text:
Patrick Wilson in Fargo season 2. Photo: Chris Large/FX Between Big Little Lies , Feud , American Crime , and now Fargo , we’ve started to arrive at one of the most exciting seasons of TV mini-series in recent memory. FX announced today that the third installment of Noah Hawley’s Coen brothers–inspired series will arrive on April 19. Set in 2010, the series stars Ewan McGregor as two twins , The Leftovers’ Carrie Coon as a police chief named Gloria Burgle, 10 Cloverfield Lane ’s Mary Elizabeth Winstead as the less successful twin’s girlfriend, and David Thewlis as “a mysterious loner and a true capitalist.” It’s gonna be some dark stuff, dontcha know.
